item.title: Fidji Simo 在八月启动之前阐述了作为 OpenAI 应用首席执行官的愿景
item.description: 即将离任的 Instacart 首席执行官菲吉-西莫（Fidji Simo）将前往 OpenAI，她在下个月正式加入 ChatGPT 制造商之前，概述了自己对新设立的应用首席执行官一职的愿景。【原文：Fidji Simo, the outgoing Instacart chief executive officer headed to OpenAI, outlined her vision for the newly created role of CEO of applications ahead of her official start at the ChatGPT maker next month.】

item.title: 重估后 2024 年尼日利亚国内生产总值增至 372.8 万亿奈拉
item.description: 在统计部门改变了计算国内生产总值的方式并开始在计算中加入更多非正规部门之后，尼日利亚的经济规模比以前估计的要大。【原文：Nigeria’s economy is bigger than previously estimated, after statistics authorities changed the way they calculate gross domestic product and started adding more informal sectors to its calculations.】

item.title: 花旗银行预计博茨瓦纳货币将因钻石价格下滑而再次贬值
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.）称，博茨瓦纳很可能再次将其货币贬值，因为这个南部非洲国家正在应对其主要收入来源--全球钻石价格暴跌导致的收入下滑。【原文：Citigroup Inc. says Botswana is likely to devalue its currency again, as the southern African nation battles a downturn in revenues linked to the sharp collapse in global diamond prices, its main revenue source.】

item.title: 橙汁进口商称特朗普对巴西征收关税将抬高美国价格
item.description: 一家美国橙汁经销商正就唐纳德-特朗普总统从下月起对巴西征收 50%关税的举措提起诉讼。【原文：A US orange juice distributor is suing over President Donald Trump’s move to impose a 50% tariff on Brazil starting next month.】

item.title: 英国制裁卢克石油公司，再次打击俄罗斯影子舰队
item.description: 作为针对莫斯科出口的 100 多项措施的一部分，英国制裁了俄罗斯最大的私营石油生产商卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）的一个贸易部门。【原文：The UK sanctioned a trading unit of Russia’s biggest private oil producer Lukoil PJSC as part of 100-plus measures targeting Moscow’s exports.】

item.title: 埃及最新液化天然气进口终端启动，缓解天然气紧张状况
item.description: 埃及两个新的液化天然气浮式码头现已投入运营，为这个去年因国内供应紧张和需求上升而成为燃料净进口国的北非国家带来了一些宽慰。【原文：Two new LNG floating terminals are now operational in Egypt, bringing some relief to the North African nation that last year turned into a net importer of the fuel due to domestic supply crunches and rising demand.】

item.title: 欧洲高收益基金迎来今年以来最多的单周资金流入
item.description: 上周，欧洲的垃圾债券基金创下了今年以来的最大单周流入量，因为投资者继续涌入这一收益率相对丰厚、稳定且可分散美元投资的资产类别。【原文：Junk bond funds based in Europe saw their biggest weekly inflow of the year last week, as investors continue to pile into an asset class that offers relatively generous yields, stability and diversification away from the US dollar.】

item.title: 以太坊加密货币库将在 15 亿美元 SPAC 交易中上市
item.description: 在超过 15 亿美元的加密货币和股票融资的支持下，一家以太坊财务公司已同意在一次空白支票公司合并中上市，加入了数字资产走向公开市场的大潮。【原文：An Ethereum treasury firm has agreed to go public in a blank-check company merger backed by more than $1.5 billion of crypto and stock financing, joining the rush of digital assets heading to public markets.】

item.title: Steinhoff 旗下公司将出售 16 亿美元的 Pepkor 股份
item.description: Ibex 的前身是 Steinhoff International Holdings NV.，将退出其持有的非洲最大服装零售商 Pepkor Holdings Ltd. 28% 的股份。【原文：Ibex, formerly known as Steinhoff International Holdings NV., will exit its 28% stake in Africa’s largest clothing retailer Pepkor Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 埃利奥特呼吁英国石油公司新任主席尽快弥补缺陷
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）是英国石油公司（BP Plc）最大的股东之一，它希望这家能源巨头的继任董事长紧急改善公司的成本基础和资本分配，理由是扭亏为盈计划不力。【原文：Elliott Investment Management, which is one of BP Plc’s largest shareholders, wants the energy giant’s incoming chairman to urgently improve the firm’s cost base and capital allocation, citing a weak turnaround plan.】

item.title: 竞争对手英国工党和改革派为提高退休年龄敞开大门
item.description: 执政党工党和新成立的竞争对手英国改革党分别为可能提高退休年龄敞开了大门，此举将有助于削减政府成本，但几乎肯定会招致公众的反弹。【原文：The ruling Labour party and upstart rival Reform UK separately opened the door to a potential increase in the retirement age, a move that would help cut the government’s costs but almost certainly draw a backlash from the public.】

item.title: 美国杠杆贷款市场爆发 450 亿美元新交易
item.description: 根据彭博汇编的数据，周一约有 450 亿美元的美国杠杆贷款投放市场，创下历史第四高纪录，因为垃圾级借款人继续急于通过对现有贷款重新定价来降低借贷成本。【原文：About $45 billion of US leveraged loans hit the market Monday, the fourth-most ever according to data compiled by Bloomberg, as junk-rated borrowers continue rushing to lower borrowing costs by repricing existing loans.】

item.description: 用于人工智能应用的超低功耗半导体制造商 Ambiq Micro Inc.【原文：Ambiq Micro Inc., a maker of ultra-low power semiconductors for artificial intelligence applications, is seeking to raise as much as $85 million from an initial public offering.】

item.title: 花旗、巴克莱等银行支持 Advent 收购 Reckitt 部门
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）和巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）等银行将牵头进行约 29 亿美元的债务融资，以支持 Advent International 收购 Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc 的部分股权。【原文：Citigroup Inc. and Barclays Plc are among banks that are set to lead a roughly $2.9 billion-equivalent debt financing that will support Advent International’s move to buy part of Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc.】

item.title: 迈克尔-赛勒的 "战略 "在最近一次购买后拥有 3% 的比特币流通量
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的 "战略"（Strategy）公司在最近购买了原始加密货币之后，现在拥有比特币铸造总量的 3% 以上。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy now owns more than 3% of all the Bitcoin ever minted following the crypto treasury company’s latest purchase of the original cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 中国中信将在安哥拉开发大型大豆和玉米农场
item.description: 在与美国的贸易战中，世界第二大经济体寻求确保长期供应，中国国有企业集团中信集团有限公司的一个部门将在安哥拉开发大规模的大豆和玉米农场。【原文：A unit Chinese state-owned conglomerate Citic Ltd. will develop large-scale soybean and corn farms in Angola, as the world’s second-largest economy seeks to secure long-term supply amid a trade war with the US.】

item.title: 普京下令俄联邦安全局审查爆炸后进入俄罗斯港口的船只
item.description: 在油轮发生一系列神秘爆炸事件后，弗拉基米尔-普京总统收紧了从国外进入俄罗斯海港的船只规则，让国家主要安全部门发挥更大作用。【原文：President Vladimir Putin has tightened rules for ships entering Russian sea ports from abroad, giving the nation’s main security service a bigger role following a series of mysterious blasts on oil tankers.】

item.title: 调查显示，企业认为加拿大可摆脱最糟糕的关税结果
item.description: 央行的调查显示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易政策的不确定性正在抑制加拿大的商业投资和消费支出，尽管企业认为加拿大经济避免了严重衰退。【原文：Uncertainty about US President Donald Trump’s trade policy is curbing Canadian business investment and consumer spending, though firms see the economy avoiding a bad recession, central bank surveys show.】

item.title: 加密货币博彩网站 Polymarket 达成收购小型交易所协议后将重返美国市场
item.description: 被联邦监管机构踢出海外的加密博彩平台Polymarket，在检察官终止对该公司的调查仅几周后，就达成了重返美国市场的协议。【原文：Polymarket, the crypto-betting platform that was kicked offshore by federal regulators, has struck a deal to return to the US market just weeks after prosecutors shut down a probe of the company.】

item.title: 特斯拉将对抗加州对其过度夸大自动驾驶功能的指控

Their private equity owners are readying sales that don’t need debt underwriters.】

item.title: 美国股市在财报密集周前屡创新高

item.title: 优步在洛杉矶保险欺诈诉讼案中指控夸大伤者账单
item.description: 优步科技公司正在起诉洛杉矶的一群律师和医疗服务提供商，称他们进行了欺诈性保险索赔，导致公司损失了数百万美元的法律费用—；这是该公司今年提起的第三起此类诉讼。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is suing a group of lawyers and medical providers in Los Angeles who it says have made fraudulent insurance claims that cost the company millions in legal fees — the third such lawsuit it’s filed this year.】

item.title: 美国集装箱运量受关税影响将大幅逆转
item.description: 一项民间数据显示，承载美国进口货物的海运集装箱数量连续第二个月下降，这使得美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税扰乱了从国外购买商品的行为，从而使这一经济指标出现了有记录以来最大幅度的同比逆转。【原文：The number of shipping containers carrying US imports fell for a second straight month, a private gauge showed, putting the economic indicator on course for one of the sharpest year-on-year reversals on record as President Donald Trump’s tariffs disrupt purchases of goods from abroad.】

item.title: 国防承包商股票前景光明，华尔街看到了机会
item.description: 美国航空航天类股票近期一路飙升，但分析师们却从它们经常被归为一类的滞后类股票中看到了机会：国防承包商。【原文：US aerospace stocks have been soaring recently, but analysts see opportunities in a lagging cohort they’re often clumped with: defense contractors.】
